thread.section_title: Ham Yard Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fabulous venue for cocktails and a catch up!
thread.title_full: Fabulous venue for cocktails and a catch up! - Review of Ham Yard Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: citychic81
title: Fabulous venue for cocktails and a catch up!
text:
The bar and restaurant are great, with lovely decor, excellent service and delicious cocktails and food. Although it was really busy which adds to the buzzing atmosphere, we found a table immediately and were able to have a good chat while enjoying our drinks and we didn't leave until last orders.
Highly recommended.
